channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1462220990843338754
item.description: 🔴Lima Metropolitana #DatosAbiertos MINSA al 19Nov2021 📈Lima Norte: SMP, Los Olivos, Comas 📈Lima Centro: Lima Cercado, SJL, Magdalena del Mar 📈Lima Sur: VMT, Chorrillos 📈Lima Este: Lurigancho, La Molina https://t.co/E3QjxlXN0a

item.title: #es @ 1462220988867911692
item.description: 🔴Lima Metropolitana 📈 #DatosAbiertos MINSA al 19Nov2021 Promedio diario de casos #COVID19 sigue en alza desde inicio de Nov/2021: De ~300 casos diarios a ~600 en casi 3 semanas. El aumento de casos se viene dando principalmente en la DIRIS Lima Norte y Lima Centro https://t.co/jRrvKOtr9o

item.title: #en @ 1462195199694802944
item.description: 🗺️#30DayMapChallenge Day 20: #Movement ⏱️🏇 🏔️Perito Moreno #Glacier #Argentina 🇦🇷 in perfect homeostasis⚖️ 🗓️2015 to 2021 ~monthly, 2sec 🛰️Sentinel-1 #SAR custom scritp: 🧐➡️https://t.co/0tJuIfFkiN 🕵️Free to copy CC BY-SA 4.0 #OpenData #OpenSource @CopernicusEU @sentinel_hub https://t.co/pBD0naBzFm

item.title: #en @ 1462189612328128514
item.description:
It's my absolute pleasure to be involved! Encourage everyone working on accelerating materials/chemistry/physics discovery, automation, robotics to submit to us!
We also take open data seriously! This is the first step toward democratic science - testing out data reviewers! https://t.co/PUvROTrb2B

item.title: #und @ 1462168834840870921
item.description: Jako je važno da se borba za životnu sredinu zasniva na podacima i struci. U suprotnom lako može da odleprša u populizam. Sve pohvale za xEco Odžak i slične portale koji podatke približavaju građanima. @djnlkc odličan na Novoj! #opendata https://t.co/pE6qq3jPHa

item.title: #en @ 1462137389862858754
item.description: Having some fun for @tjukanov's #30DayMapChallenge day 20. Intersection between #art and #city science to depict movement: showing airflow, shipping density and railways worldwide. No land or sea lines drawn: #geography defined by #flows #GIS #dataviz #mapping #mobility #OpenData https://t.co/JtqHlteqz7

item.title: #en @ 1461803045088645127
item.description:
New to #OpenData? You might be wondering:
👉 Is data sharing even a ‘thing’ in my field? 👉 Do I have the rights to share my data? 👉 Will my research be scooped if I share?
In this blog post, you’ll find the answers to these questions and more ⬇️ https://t.co/O9b8O4m14T

item.title: #es @ 1461797581340692489
item.description: EMA da luz verde a los países miembros para autorización de uso de emergencia de molnupiravir - en paralelo se sigue procedimiento de autorización de comercialización. Se acelera el procedimiento de agencias antiviral oral y mientras seguimos sin datos abiertos 🤔 https://t.co/adwUuoHSXL

item.title: #es @ 1461774190273572867
item.description: Según la investigación, desde AGO2020 hasta NOV2020, buscaron portales de votantes estatales y de uno de ellos (de #DatosAbiertos, disponibles para consultar y usar) descargaron información sobre más de 100.000 personas.

item.title: #en @ 1461762078126055428
item.description:
I made an automated dataset that checks the NYC open data portal to determine which datasets were updated yesterday.
It runs every 24 hours and will keep itself fresh. Take a look 👀
https://t.co/DATAa0YgDJ https://t.co/zVzSVyhH4m

item.title: #fr @ 1461753093213802496
item.description: L'Open Data de la Mairie de Paris montre clairement l'explosion des plaintes liées aux #TerrassesEstivales sur les deux dernières années. Plébiscite de #DMR : le premier semestre 2021 est supérieur de 50% à l'année 2020 ENTIERE ! Bonne gestion et maîtrise du RET ! https://t.co/vegAPaQ1pR

item.title: #en @ 1461742360115752963
item.description: Today's my last day at Mapbox. It's been a joy to explore the world with satellite imagery and virtually visit the United States, Denmark, France, Switzerland, the Netherlands, Portugal, Germany, Austria, Luxembourg, and Spain through open data, supported by my stellar teammates. https://t.co/PGd7p5ZDqG

item.description: This is brilliant; sets the standard for open data. Try searching for "admissions" to find the chapter and verse on how the different nations define their numbers, how they are recorded and where they are drawn from. https://t.co/BpaE4UK35n

Aujourd’hui, focus sur @ClermontFd et l'arrivée de la #5G : 100 sites #5G sont autorisés par l’@anfr dont 88 sont déclarés techniquement opérationnels (activés) par les opérateurs mobiles. https://t.co/wC1v46U3Wx

item.title: #fr @ 1461636848011423744
item.description: @BFMTV Qu’est-ce qui peut justifier des mesures pareilles ? Ce n’est clairement pas basé sur toutes les données publiques que nous avons sur la pandémie… On nous cache quelque-chose et ce serait utile de savoir pourquoi. Maintenir les populations dans le flou est absurde ou calculé.

item.title: #fr @ 1461635909334487041
item.description: @Mediavenir Qu’est-ce qui peut justifier des mesures pareilles ? Ce n’est clairement pas basé sur toutes les données publiques que nous avons sur la pandémie… On nous cache quelque-chose et ce serait utile de savoir pourquoi. Maintenir les populations dans le flou est absurde ou calculé.

item.title: #en @ 1461463169159868420
item.description: Day 18 (Water) of #30DayMapChallenge - Areas of NYC inundated during Hurricane Sandy, shown with building footprints. (These don't show all areas of the city affected - just some hard hit areas) Data: NYC Open Data; Made in ArcGIS Pro https://t.co/enh784FOHj

item.title: #en @ 1461461088072089614
item.description:
I can't say this enough:
NYC has such a wealth of research and information we were able to build on & #opendata we could analyze - its amazing!
I think the level of detail in #StateoftheUrbanForestNYC would be tough, if not impossible to include for most other cities https://t.co/LHjjX4UPft

item.title: #en @ 1461444830672818180
item.description:
As was said months ago. For some reason we continue to build delays in data metrics here in #Germany.
#Corona data, open data, vaccinations, child vaccinations, hospital data, registered deaths.
Political? Technological? Ideological? Either way, no way to deal with disasters. https://t.co/ONQm2k2vby

item.title: #en @ 1461411032425906178
item.description:
Interested in detailed #opendata elevation information for #bcfloods? See the #LidarBC - Open #LiDAR Data Portal. DEM, DSM, and point clouds. 1:2500 scale. #laser #bcflood2021 #bcflooding #openaccess
Background on data and download 🔗: https://t.co/TAa4uEC2Ep https://t.co/ouq2aFH37x

item.title: #en @ 1461409706619121671
item.description: @ODILeeds All open source code for the analysis. All open data for the data. Lets you make graphs like this. Does all the "yes but per capita" and "yes but inflation" and "yes but what about current spending vs. capital spending" that people will demand that you do. https://t.co/v6JsXzEvnu https://t.co/qptSWzmLo9

item.title: #es @ 1461369788869926918
item.description:
⚖️El parlamento abierto se reconoce por:
✅Datos abiertos ✅documentos que sustenten toma de decisiones ✅Participación ciudadana
A nivel Latinoamérica aún falta mucho por hacer. Entendamos: el actor principal de la democracia es el ciudadano

item.title: #it @ 1461357515141095438
item.description: A ottobre avevamo evidenziato alcune criticità sui dati pubblicati dal governo sul Pnrr. Oggi registriamo un ulteriore passo indietro. Per questo chiediamo che venga sospesa la pubblicazione della sezione open data del portale Italia domani. https://t.co/FhYsPuEGSi

item.title: #en @ 1461352448409309196
item.description: I was asked to talk on digital connectivity at the @SmartCityexpo Barcelona. This was the issue for us 25 years ago. Now we are world leaders in e-connectivity.
